long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a _awesome_ extension that searches your pages for content encapsulated in underscores( _ ) and makes that content italicized. It also searches for content encapsulated in stars ( * ) and makes it bold!

Update:
Awesomifier is even _more_ awesome now!

We now support `backticks`, and  ``` TRIPLE
BACKTICKS``` for highlighting and multiline highlighting (ideal for code!)
And ~tildes~ for strike through effects
